description.oldValue:
Teams now supports an Explicit Recording Consent meeting policy. When the policy is applied, the Teams meeting window will request explicit consent of all participants to be recorded. Before a user gives consent, the user’s audio, video, and screenshare/consent-share won’t be captured in the meeting recording.
GA date: March CY2023
description.newValue:
Teams now supports an Explicit Recording Consent
meeting policy. When the policy is applied, the Teams meeting window will
request explicit consent of all participants to be recorded. Before a user gives
consent, the user’s audio, video, and
screenshare/consent-share won’t be captured in the
meeting recording.
